CustomField.formula: IF(NextActivityDueinDays__c <=-1, IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "red flag"), IF( AND(NextActivityDueinDays__c >=0,NextActivityDueinDays__c <=5) , IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow flag"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "green flag") ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Red/Amber/Green flag status based on when the next activity is due
CustomField.label: Coverage Indicator
